The PR: #16295 which changed the shadow plugin version has re-introduced the issue with publication of signed jars, fixed in: #15308.

This PR reverts #16295 to unblock Kafka 4.0 release. And we should aim for fixing the issue permanently as being discussed here: #18018.

Seems same issue was encountered during Kafka-3.9 release and same commit was reverted in 3.9 as well: #17218.
